title: Docusaurus 3.3
authors: [slorber]

date: 2024-05-03

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: We are happy to announce **Docusaurus 3.3**.

translations.zh-hant: 我們很高興宣布 **Docusaurus 3.3** 正式發布。

segments.source_content: Upgrading should be easy. Our [release process](/community/release-process) respects [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/). Minor versions do not include any breaking changes.

translations.zh-hant: 升級過程應該很簡單。我們的[發布流程](/community/release-process)遵循[語意化版本控制](https://semver.org/)。次要版本更新不會包含任何破壞性變更。

segments.source_content: ![Docusaurus blog post social card](./img/social-card.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Docusaurus 部落格文章社交卡片](./img/social-card.png)

segments.source_content: <!--truncate-->

segments.source_content:
import BrowserWindow from '@site/src/components/BrowserWindow';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_55ad7c88

segments.source_content: ## Highlights

translations.zh-hant: ## 重點更新

segments.source_content: ### Prepare for React 19

translations.zh-hant: ### 為 React 19 做準備

segments.source_content: The React core team recently [released the first **React 19 beta**](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19). They also [published an upgrade guide and a **React v18.3 release**](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19-upgrade-guide) with new warnings to help us identify issues **before upgrading to React 19**.

translations.zh-hant: React 核心團隊近期[發布了首個 **React 19 beta 版本**](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19)，同時也[公布了升級指南及 **React v18.3 版本**](https://react.dev/blog/2024/04/25/react-19-upgrade-guide)，其中包含新的警告訊息以幫助我們在升級至 React 19 前識別潛在問題。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 depends on React `18.x`. When initializing a new Docusaurus sites, it will use that new React `18.3` release. It's also the case if you decide to upgrade your dependencies, or re-generate your package manager lockfile.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus v3 依賴於 React `18.x`。當初始化新的 Docusaurus 站點時，將使用最新的 React `18.3` 版本。如果您選擇升級依賴項或重新生成套件管理器鎖定文件，情況也是如此。

segments.source_content: It turns out in its current state, **Docusaurus had a few of those extra warnings to fix**, notably this one immediately appearing on your dev console on any page load and navigation:

translations.zh-hant: 目前發現 **Docusaurus 存在一些需要修復的警告訊息**，特別是在任何頁面加載和導航時，開發者控制台會立即顯示以下警告：

segments.source_content: > Warning: LoadableComponent uses the legacy contextTypes API which is no longer supported and will be removed in the next major release. Use React.createContext() with static contextType instead.

translations.zh-hant: > 警告：LoadableComponent 使用了舊版的 contextTypes API，該 API 已不再支援並將在下個主要版本中移除。請改用 React.createContext() 配合靜態 contextType。

segments.source_content: In [#10079](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10079), we got Docusaurus ready for React 19. We fixed all the React 18.3 warnings we encountered. In case we missed any, don't hesitate to [**report new warnings**](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/10099) if you see them, to us but also to other Docusaurus third-party plugin authors.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#10079](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10079) 中，我們讓 Docusaurus 做好了迎接 React 19 的準備。我們修復了所有遇到的 React 18.3 警告。如果我們遺漏了任何警告，請不要猶豫[向我們回報新發現的警告](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/10099)，同時也請通知其他 Docusaurus 第三方插件作者。

segments.source_content: ### `createSitemapItems`

translations.zh-hant: ### `createSitemapItems`

segments.source_content: In [#10083](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10083), we introduced a new flexible `createSitemapItems()` hook to the sitemap plugin. This enables users to create/filter/transform/enhance the sitemap items with their own custom logic.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#10083](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10083) 中，我們為站點地圖插件引入了新的彈性鉤子 `createSitemapItems()`。這讓使用者能夠通過自定義邏輯來創建/過濾/轉換/增強站點地圖項目。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_4dd51304

segments.source_content: ### Pages plugin improvements

translations.zh-hant: ### 頁面插件改進

segments.source_content: The Docusaurus [pages plugin](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-content-pages) has historically been lagging behind the docs and blog plugins in terms of available feature.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 的[頁面插件](/docs/api/plugins/@docusaurus/plugin-content-pages)在功能可用性方面長期落後於文檔和部落格插件。

segments.source_content: In [#10032](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10032) we normalized the options available on each core content plugins by adding a few the missing page plugins APIs related to the edit url and the last update metadata displayed at the bottom on Markdown pages.

translations.zh-hant: 在 [#10032](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10032) 中，我們通過添加幾個缺失的頁面插件 API 來規範化每個核心內容插件的選項，這些 API 與編輯 URL 和顯示在 Markdown 頁面底部的最後更新元數據相關。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_1d510af2

segments.source_content: <IframeWindow url="/examples/markdownPageExample" />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_46cf9aca

segments.source_content:
:::note[Only for Markdown pages]

These new plugin options only apply to Markdown pages, and have no effect on React pages for which you have full control over the layout with JSX.

:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note[僅適用於 Markdown 頁面]

這些新插件選項僅適用於 Markdown 頁面，對於您通過 JSX 完全控制佈局的 React 頁面沒有影響。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Other changes

translations.zh-hant: ## 其他變更

segments.source_content: Other notable changes include:

translations.zh-hant: 其他值得注意的變更包括：

segments.source_content:
- [#10064](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10064): new site config option `siteConfig.markdown.anchors.maintainCase`
- [#9767](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9767): new `docusaurus deploy --target-dir` option
- [#10042](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10042): new (experimental) plugin API: `route.props`
- [#10060](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10060): optimizes the App entrypoint, avoid useless re-renders on navigations
- [#10080](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10080): `<Admonition>` component can render properly without heading/icon
- [#10091](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10091): `<Tabs>` props can now override defaults
- [#10090](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10090): `docusaurus serve` works better with a `/baseUrl/` pathname prefix
- [#10070](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10070): add missing theme translations for `pt-BR`
- [#10025](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10025): doc sidebar item label now impacts the doc pagination label

translations.zh-hant:
- [#10064](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10064): 新增網站配置選項 `siteConfig.markdown.anchors.maintainCase`
- [#9767](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/9767): 新增 `docusaurus deploy --target-dir` 選項
- [#10042](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10042): 新增（實驗性）插件 API: `route.props`
- [#10060](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10060): 優化 App 入口點，避免導航時不必要的重新渲染
- [#10080](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10080): `<Admonition>` 元件現在可不需標題/圖標正常渲染
- [#10091](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10091): `<Tabs>` 的 props 現在可覆蓋預設值
- [#10090](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10090): `docusaurus serve` 在 `/baseUrl/` 路徑前綴下運作更佳
- [#10070](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10070): 新增 `pt-BR` 語系缺少的主題翻譯
- [#10025](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/pull/10025): 文件側邊欄項目標籤現在會影響文件分頁標籤

segments.source_content: Check the **[3.3.0 changelog entry](/changelog/3.3.0)** for an exhaustive list of changes.

translations.zh-hant: 查閱 **[3.3.0 變更記錄](/changelog/3.3.0)** 以獲取完整的變更清單。
